subtitleNullable: Team, Shot, Match and Player data from various leagues in seasons 13/14-20/21
descriptionNullable:
### Context

Upgrade from my previous dataset - there is now information regarding players and shots as well as the previous team and match data for each of the 5 major leagues from 13/14 to 20/21, as well as the RFPL. 


### Content

Every stat that Understat had - it's all here. Computationally, it took its time and it's still incomplete - however I thought I'd put this out there as the only leagues with anything missing are Ligue 1 and the RFPL.


### Acknowledgements

https://understat.com/ - great service for all your football (soccor) stat needs.


### Inspiration

I really enjoy football and data - mixing the two into one on Kaggle was a fun summer project in Data engineering & Data Science ahead of the new season! On my other dataset - I have a notebook showing a Neural Network being used to track probability of matches being won/drawn/lost by each team in a given game.
title: Football (Soccor) Team, Shot & Player stats 13-21
